column1: Local Foods////This place has the best sandwiches and salads of any restaurant I know of in Houston. Â  Everything is extremely high quality
column3: and they have a lot of unusual things in their menu. The sides also are excellent. Try the crab and shrimp sandwich
column4: it's terrific. The service also is great
column5: and the people who work there are always really nice. I get takeout from them routinely
column6: and it is always fast and delicious.
